Articles.Content:
Floor 2975: This room only holds a bowl of Petunias. Strangely it speaks, and says "Oh no not again". You get a strange feeling of connection and DejaVu. You feel like you should know what it meant. You puzzle over it as you climb to the next floor. Instinctively you reach in to the bag of holding and pull out a nice fluffy towel. You have the feeling you may need it.

 

Wow, new page. This is quite the page turner.

Edited January 29, 2022 by ColdJ

Floor 2976:
A sign saying "Bathroom is at floor 2999". After climbing those stairs you must be nasty right now!

Floor 2977: A swimming pool. You go for a swim but while you are in there you swear something swam in to your ear. Some sounds you have been hearing in the background now seem to be voices talking. You dry off with your @Admiral Fluffy quality towel and head up to the next level.
Floor 2978: People full of gossip. Ignoring them, you go to the next floor.
Floor 2979: Just a sign pointing up that says "Floor 2980 this way".
Floor 2980: The picture of your future boyfriend/girlfriend. And you gotta say, they're gorgeous! Lucky person.
Floor 2981: You hear Tina Turner's "Whats Love Got To Do With It" on high repeat.

101(pages) x 25(posts in a single page) + 8(posts in this page, including me) - 1(Floor 0) = 2533 and not 2981

Floor 2533: A sign reads, "egap wen kool yeh". You go to next floor, wondering what it means.

On 1/21/2022 at 7:53 PM, DunaManiac said:

Floor 2942: A large platform juts out with a trampoline labeled "JUMP TO THE TOP!" You jump, but unfortunately you barely miss the top, causing you to crash back down onto the bare steel floor instead of the trampoline, which has inconveniently has been retracted and moved underneath the platform.

The previous floor was floor 2491, not 2941 @DunaManiac. Sorry but we're right now on floor 2533.

Gaaah, we missed the milestone floor 2500!

@Nazalassa You were right about the mix up but not the floor number. Everybody keeps forgetting the ground floor

I found the problem on page 100, @DunaManiac flipped the end numbers around on a post just after one of mine and by the time I posted again I didn't realise it had happened.

Floor 2533: The room is as empty as your mind as you feel like the building is playing mind games on you. You fold your towel and put it under your head to lie down and meditate for a while.

Floor 2534.

A mad floor counter shows changing numbers from 2534 to 2981 and back.
2535: A room where the walls are covered in random numbers.
Floor 2536: as you finally guessed which floor number you are currently, you start to feel calmed, for a few moments.
... then the floor 2537 falls from top.

Floor 2538: Our Song playing, since you're a Swiftie, you stay for a while and you hum along. And oh! It has a bed and an air-con! You drift to sleep while listening to all songs of Taylor Swift. You wake up when she sings about the writing on the keychain (All Too Well 10 Minute Version)

Floor 2539: As you walk into a "Blank Space" a blonde lady says to you "You Need To Calm Down", "Look What You Made Me Do". "Me"? you say. You feel yourself getting "Red" so you "Shake it Off" and start to head up to the next floor. "Are You Ready For It"?
Floor 2540: You take a rest in a comfy chair  and feel sad that @Kerbal Productions never saw the last floor.
Floor 2541: You are very, VERY careful to not fall into the Pit of Bad Video Game Designs. You can see Albacore staring at you as you walk out of the room.
Flooor 2542: Me clapping on @ColdJ's post. I'm so glad, you get a free gold bar!
Floor 2543: Gravity is already 75% of normal, according to the built-in gravimeter in your watches.
Floor 2544: Fire grenades are everywhere. You panic, then remember that "fire grenade" meant "fire extinguisher" in the 1950s. This room must be ANCIENT!
Floor 2545: All my rants on anime
Floor 2546: A gigantic model railroad. You wander around for a while, looking at the amazing details.
Floor 2547: ohhhhh... this is where KSP 2 is currently being premiered, and look! They already finished the game!

14 hours ago, Kerbal Productions said:

Floor 2545: All my rants on anime

Floor 2548: All my rants on people NOT liking anime.
Floor 2549: A Michael Jackson Statue is found in the middle of the floor. Seems to be made of Jacksonium. Cool.
